Describe your issue: There seems to be a lot of glitches in canva Pro.
I'm currently using the font 'lovelo' for a brand I'm creating and the 'o' in each word aren't appearing on the text, yet when I log into my account on my phone, they appear. 
Also, the cursor is glitching whilst typing, jumping to another of the word and making my text in the wrong order.
What do you need help with?: It is not letting me to type text. Very annoying

IT WASN'T THEREFORE, IT WAS, SIMPLY, CLICKING AND CAN CHANGE THE TEXT AS DESIRED. IT WASN'T NECESSARY TO STAY LEAVING TO BE ABLE TO CHANGE IT, PLEASE, SET IT UP !!!!!
